Flu vaccines do not protect people from flu-related deaths The CDC claims that an astonishing 36000 people die from flu in an average year  Butaccording to the former Secretary of Health and Human Services Tommy Thompson 68people under 65 die from flu each year in the US  The truth is that in 4 years a total4440 people mostly elderly died from flu no where near the CDC’s touted 144000deaths ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~You're trying to compare two entirely different sets of statistics here as if they were measuring the same quantity and falsely assuming someone is being dishonest for PR reasons  The first number is an estimate based on a 2003 research study of FLU-RELATED deaths  It includes both people who died directly of the flu and ALSO people who died of secondary infections like pneumonia they caught as a direct result of having first had the flu and having become susceptible to the secondary infection  The second lower statistic includes only those people who had flu listed on their death certificates as their proximate (direct) cause of death and it's guaranteed to be an underestimate of true flu mortality for several reasons: 1) because most people aren't tested for flu upon their deaths nor have autopsies done to establish the diagnosis so might have other causes listed when they really died of flu 2) because people who died of secondary infections directly brought on by flu aren't included even though flu was ultimately what initiated their death and 3) many flu deaths get falsely attributed to other causes (PE cardiac arrest multiple organ failure etc ) even though flu caused these other things and 4) flu isn't reportable to the CDC's database as a cause of death in most age groups pediatric patients being the major exception  Thus the two statistics are two sides of the coin with reality being somewhere in the middle

A novel feature of the two H1N1 vaccines being developed by companies Novartis and GlaxoSmithKline is the addition of squalene-containing adjuvants   ~~~~~~~~~~Squalene has been used for years in Europe and Africa  It is not novel and it is not new  It just hasn't been used in very many US vaccines to date ______________“Research shows that squalene is the experimental anthrax vaccine ingredient that caused devastating autoimmune diseases and deaths for many Gulf War veterans~~~~~~~~~The purported link between GWS and squalene is tentative and needs much more investigation  Some research studies have found anti-squalene antibodies in those suffering from Gulf War Syndrome  Nothing conclusive has been determined as to their role in GWS  Such antibodies would be expected in those who've been given an injection containing the substance as an adjuvant  Their presence doesn't mean they necessarily caused disease  It is certainly an error at this point to say it has been proven that squalene caused devastating autoimmune diseases and deaths for many Gulf War veterans  It would be appropriate to say the substance is being investigated as to its role if any in GWS

Realitybit this isn't a man-made virus  It's pig-made like lots of viruses are  Pigs are great viral incubators and viruses have a marvelous ability to swap genes inside pig cells  This one has been identified as a triple-reassortant virus a three-fer bug that combined genes from a seasonal human virus (part of the H3N2 family) with a North American bird virus and a classic swine flu virus  That bug had probably been circulating among pigs for a long time—as much as a decade—before it combined sometime last year with two other types of pig viruses and then acquired the ability to jump to humans  It’s a mostly swine virus that also contains elements of bird and human viruses  Doran you’ll forgive me if I continue to call you on your baloney  Those are not academic sources on why a cleaner environment is responsible for less flu development! Butylated Hydroxytoluene (BHT) as an adjuvant/prophylactic for influenza The food preservative Butylated Hydroxytoluene (BHT) is reported to be an immune system booster with regard to lipid (fatty) coated viruses including those for influenza  [Caution! BHT is not considered to be a health aid other than for its role as a food preservative ] It is however a powerful antioxidant and can be said to behave like a beefed up version of Vitamin C or E  One version (there are at least three) of what BHT does with regard to lipid coated viruses centers on the idea that viral lipid coats serve as cloaking devices which prevent your immune system from seeing what's inside them  BHT as a powerful antioxidant is thought to strip the fatty coats off viral bodies or damage them enough so that your immune system can see the bad stuff and take it out  BHT is inexpensive and typically comes as a white crystaline powder in 250 mg capsules  (You most likely will have to order it online ) BHT is soluble in animal fat and alcohol (not water)  One European investigator who studied the effect of BHT on animals found that 27 mg per 100 pounds of body weight is a safe amount to ingest daily  Many people use 250 mg per day and more  Caution it is also a blood thinner  If you are on blood thinners including asprin you might want to take it the easy side with BHT

comments:
From the article: Avoiding the H1N1 Virus and Staying Healthy in Pregnancy
Everywhere you turn there is someone talking about the swine flu (H1N1 virus) and pregnancy  We know that there are ways to Prevent the H1N1 Virus like handwashing and avoiding sick people  There is also a vaccine coming  What are you doing to protect yourself and your baby? Will you take the vaccine? Will you avoid crowds? Have you talked to your practitioner about a plan of action if you do fall ill? Share Your Thoughts
Effects of H1N1 Vaccination on Unborn

    The mother of our granddaughter received the H1N1 vaccination about three weeks before our granddaughter was born  Immediately after birth medical staff were concerned about the condition of the baby  Now after four months and many tests and hospital stays a neurologist has found from an MRI that the baby's brain and brain stem are smaller than they should be  There is also more fluid around the brain than there should be  Therefore doctors say to expect slow and limited development  The very interesting point is that the neorologist says he feels that what ever caused the unusual brain development happened late in the pregnancy!
—Guest Worried Grandma

You CAN'T get the flu from the vaccine

    Just so you are aware you CANNOT get the flu from the flu SHOT  The viral component of the vaccine is only pieces of the virus and as such it is a DEAD virus therefore you cannot get the flu  If you have flu-like symptoms you may have already been exposed to the virus before the vaccine took effect in your immune system (typically 2 weeks to take effect) OR most reactions after receiving a vaccination are fever muscle and joint soreness achy lethargy and some pain at the site  If you have those symptoms just take some Tylenol drink some extra fluids and get some rest  Don't blame the vaccine! When you get vaccinated you are not only protecting yourself or your children  You are protecting an infinite number of people around you or who could potentially come into contact with you when you could be carrying and transmitting a virus without even knowing you've been infected (not showing symptoms YET or never showing symptoms!) Take care of yourself AND OTHERS  Be well
—Guest Laura RN

I've had mine!

    I had my swine flu jab my arm was really painful the 1st night but I've had it pretty easy after I've heard of some of the complaints people have had  Fingers crossed all will be well   
—mumof6plusexpecting

Vitamin D

    Vitamin D is also a great way to protect against the flu  We can get it from sunlight 
—Guest Joanne

Get all the information

    In Canada there is less mercury in the H1N1 flu shot than there is in a tuna fish sandwich  Yes we're told to reduce mercury intake but make sure the amount you're avoiding in the shot is actually an amount that is a concern  Check to see how much mercury is in the shot available in the US before you freak out and avoid a shot that could save your life or your baby's life  
—Guest Laura

Not Fun

    As someone who contracted H1N1 during her third trimester I would highly recommend pregnant women do anything possible to protect themselves from this flu  Whether you get a flu shot or choose to protect yourself in another way (I've read that salt-water gargling and nasal cleansing can be effective)  I was completely bed-ridden exhausted and in extreme discomfort for several days even after beginning a treatment of tamiflu  7 days later and I'm still tired and sore  Several of my acquaintances have found themselves in the hospital with pneumonia and breathing difficulty  If you do find yourself with symptoms see your dr  rightaway because tamiflu is only affective if begun within the first 48 hours of symptoms 
—Guest kristen

vaccines

    The H1N1 vaccine is no different than the seasonal flu vaacine which has been given for the last 20+ years with the exception of the viruse that it is meant to protect us from  So we have had years of its use and proven safety  If they virus mutates then potentially it will not be as effective but hopefully it will still impart some immunity so we will fair better if infected  
—Guest cec

I will keep hands clean cover my mouth and rest as much as I can  That will keep me safer I think

Thimerosal and Vaccines

    In response to bek this is directly from the CDC website: Is it safe for pregnant women to receive an influenza vaccine that contains thimerosal? Yes  A study of influenza vaccination examining over 2000 pregnant women demonstrated no adverse fetal effects associated with influenza vaccine  Case reports and limited studies indicate that pregnancy can increase the risk for serious medical complications of influenza  One study found that out of every 10000 women in their third trimester of pregnancy during an average flu season 25 will be hospitalized for flu related complications  Additionally influenza-associated excess deaths among pregnant women have been documented during influenza pandemics  Because pregnant women are at increased risk for influenza-related complications and because a substantial safety margin has been incorporated into the health guidance values for organic mercury exposure the benefits of influenza vaccine with reduced or standard thimerosal content   
—BethP781

Fetal complications from Flu

    The flu regular flu or S1N1 can lead to very serious problems in the fetus even if the mother gets over it with little issue  Babies can suffer brain trama mental retardation and cerebral palsy among other things from an infection in the womb or from the flu where the mother's immune system goes into overdrive and actually starts attacking the fetal cells  As for the flu shot do you KNOW? It contains thermasil  The children's vaccines have been getting the hype but the regular seasonal flu shots have always contained thermasil  If you are pregnant ASK FOR THE THERMASIL FREE SHOT!!!! This includes the S1N1 flu shot  They are harder to come by but worth it  Pass it on to your pregnant friends  Get educated about thermasil in flu shots  There are options  I get the flu shots for myself and my family but only the thermasil/mercury free ones  They are now recommending 2 flu shots for the h1n1 flu  Good luck!
—Guest apstarlet

No Vaccine for Me

    Some of the H1N1 vaccines contain Thimerosal (mercury) which HAS BEEN PROVEN to cause damage to developing babies' brains  Why would they discourage eating fish and risk exposure to lower levels of mercury but push this drug which has not yet been tested? I will take all the precautions I can to stay healthy in my 3rd trimester but I will not be taking the vaccine

(34) alicesalsy says:

    I’ve just hit the three month mark I had swine flu a couple of weeks ago and both me and the baby are fine  I wanted to post to reassure those of you who have been left scared by all the government confusion and media hype 

    For me it was a very mild illness  I did have a temperature but it was slight  The soar throat/ cough isn’t fun but compared to a flu I caught last Christmas it was really minor  I spent a day in bed a day in front of the TV and then I was up and about around the house 

    First I spoke to an out-of-hours doctor who I admit was a bit rubbish and didn’t give me any advice  But then I spoke to my GP who was excellent  She told me to watch my temperature get in contact if symptoms got worse and having discussed it we decided together that I shouldn’t take anything just yet as personally I prefer not to take any unnecessary medication 

    I know flu hits different people in different ways but I think I’m likely to be fairly average  I don’t have any additional health problems but nor am I any kind of health nut; I’m just a normal mum-to-be  With paracetamol and lots of fluids my temperature never got to dangerous levels  I really do want to reassure others that as long as you look after yourself (or get your bloke to look after you!) if you’re anything like me it’s likely to be a very mild illness  I have lots of friends who had much worse flu than the version I got while they were pregnant and their babies are beautiful healthy and full of handy antibodies

(61) pregnant with swine flu says:

    I am 12 weeks pregnant and have been diagnosed with swine flu this week  I started Tamiflu which is the recommended course of treatment for pregnant women with flu  The benefits of being treated with Tamiflu (decreases viral replication shortens symptom period) in pregnancy OUTWEIGHS the risk of complicated cases of flu by not undergoing treatment  Especially if you have underlying health problems  Tamiflu is most effective within the first 48 hours of symptom onset  In pregnancy you must keep hydrated with plenty of fluids and if unable to keep them down you should go to the ER for intravenous (IV) fluid hydration  Dehydration puts the pregnant woman at risk for uterine contraction which could ultimately lead to premature labor or miscarriage if you are early in pregnancy  Controlling fever is very important–only use acetaminophen/Tylenol…no aspirin aleve or advil in pregnancy  Hyperthermia in the pregnant mother can increase risks of neural tube defects  Finally please get vaccinated for both influenza and H1N1 this fall if you are pregnant you may receive the vaccines in any trimester  Get plenty of rest drink fluids and keep your distance from other at home–sleep in separate rooms from your partner until you recover  Also use a separate hand towl in the bathroom and replace your toothbrush once your symptoms resolve  Take care and good luck

from Marymoomoo
Old Oct 19 2009 06:30 PM

Originally Posted by DuluthMike View Post

    Why not separate and pump the milk? Influenza does not pass through milk but most certainly does pass through droplet in a 10 foot radius 

That is true  Thus the precautions listed 

Why not separate and pump?

1  Babies need to be with their mothers and vice versa  This is especially true in the early newborn stage 
2  A sick mother isn't likely to have the energy or desire to pump milk because it's a time consuming and draining process  It would be easier for the mother to rest and breastfeed directly  Also there would be less risk of incidental conatimination (assuming the mother is following precautions including wearing a mask) with direct breastfeeding  Especially with an illness as serious as the flu can be breastfeeding should continue so that the infant benefits from the immune factors that breastmilk provides 

The bottom line is separation stresses both baby and mother and threatens the breastfeeding relationship (which can have far reaching consequences)  Separation is unnecessary because reasonable precautions can be taken in order to prevent infection

at 5:26 PM ETCBC reporting on the situation in Calgary is more hyperbole than fact 

The clinics in Calgary were scheduled to be open between 8 am and 3:30 pm  This means that only a certain number of Calgarians could be accommodated during the operating hours of the clinics  I was at the Whitehorn clinic  At 6 am there were 175 people in line  By 7 am there were 350+  By the time the clinic opened there were about 2000-2500 people in line at most 

Once the clinic opened everything proceeded smoothly and orderly  Yes there were a few who attempted to line jump but they were escorted to the end of the line by security  If anything early arrivals acting as placeholders created more problems than line jumpers as family and friends showed up to swell the front of the line  Police were on hand to direct traffic and ensure order 

Could it have been better absolutely  There were no garbage cans and no portable washrooms outside the clinic The lines outside the clinic were also haphazard  While organization inside the clinic was good it suffered from several design flaws that impeded flow 

That said my wife and I were in and out of the clinic in under 4 hours 

That there is higher demand than available supply of both vaccine and service is due to poor communication on this issue  The public has been urged to get vaccinated by government and media (in fact those choosing not to be vaccinated have been ridiculed by the media including the CBC)  Since Monday public health officials have been urging only those at high risk to get in line but have also said that they would not turn away anyone  Moreover there is no easy way to tell if someone is at high risk aside from gender and age  Diabetes asthma and other co-morbidities are not discernible at a glance

at 4:37 PM ETOld story from 2004 from the Center for Infectious Disease Research & Policy:

CDC to mix avian human flu viruses in pandemic study

Jan 14 2004 (CIDRAP News) – One of the worst fears of infectious disease experts is that the H5N1 avian influenza virus now circulating in parts of Asia will combine with a human-adapted flu virus to create a deadly new flu virus that could spread around the world 

That could happen scientists predict if someone who is already infected with an ordinary flu virus contracts the avian virus at the same time  The avian virus has already caused at least 48 confirmed human illness cases in Asia of which 35 have been fatal  The virus has shown little ability to spread from person to person but the fear is that a hybrid could combine the killing power of the avian virus with the transmissibility of human flu viruses 

Now rather than waiting to see if nature spawns such a hybrid US scientists are planning to try to breed one themselves—in the name of preparedness 

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) will soon launch experiments designed to combine the H5N1 virus and human flu viruses and then see how the resulting hybrids affect animals  The goal is to assess the chances that such a reassortant virus will emerge and how dangerous it might be 

CDC officials confirmed the plans for the research as described recently in media reports particularly in a Canadian Press (CP) story

at 5:11 PM ETHere's a suggestion for investigative reporting -- and for consideration by readers  No one seems to talk about it    

I think that the greatest value of this whole H1N1 event is that national and international communities have a chance to test & hone their emergency response effectiveness  Governments hospital leaders of the medical communities local response units the IT world that tracks and analyzes patterns    It's as though H1N1 is providing a test for the proposals that were set up after SARS

at 2:41 PM ETTo those who think these viruses are created in the lab I wonder which labs created these pandemics 
__________
# Plague of Athens 430 BC  Typhoid fever killed a quarter of the Athenian troops and a quarter of the population over four years  This disease fatally weakened the dominance of Athens but the sheer virulence of the disease prevented its wider spread; i e  it killed off its hosts at a rate faster than they could spread it  The exact cause of the plague was unknown for many years 

# Antonine Plague 165–180  Possibly smallpox brought to the Italian peninsula by soldiers returning from the Near East; it killed a quarter of those infected and up to five million in all  At the height of a second outbreak the Plague of Cyprian (251–266) which may have been the same disease 5000 people a day were said to be dying in Rome 

# Plague of Justinian from 541 to 750 was the first recorded outbreak of the bubonic plague  It started in Egypt and reached Constantinople the following spring killing (according to the Byzantine chronicler Procopius) 10000 a day at its height and perhaps 40% of the city's inhabitants  The plague went on to eliminate a quarter to a half of the human population that it struck throughout the known world  It caused Europe's population to drop by around 50% between 550 and 700 

# Black Death started 1300s  The total number of deaths worldwide is estimated at 75 million people  Eight hundred years after the last outbreak the plague returned to Europe  Starting in Asia the disease reached Mediterranean and western Europe in 1348 (possibly from Italian merchants fleeing fighting in the Crimea) and killed an estimated 20 to 30 million Europeans

Dragon Chaser wrote:Posted 2009/09/29
at 10:35 PM ET> US 2009/0010962 A1
patent application <

There are 18 sequences 

The first thing I did was go:

http://www patentlens net/sequence/blast/seqserver html

I enter the patent # and tell it sequences 1 - 18  I click on 18 DNA/RNA sequences and a table of the first ten come up  The first 7 sequences are the longest and thus the most likely to have any biological significance  If I recall correctly the first 10 or so all came up as being most homologous to a previous H3N2 isolate:

Influenza A virus (A/mallard/South Dakota/Sg-00128/2007(H3N2)

Only sequence number 14 which is 44 base pairs ever shows novel H1N1 homology but the matches listed are numerous (because the sequence is short and because novel H1N1 doesn't contain novel gene sequences it contains those genes assembled in a unique combination)  The e-value is 0 12 and there are 22/22 identities (the length of H1N1 genes ranges from 2299 bp in PB1 to 847 bp in NS) so 22 bp is a small sequence  There are at least 100 other sequences that show up with the same e-value which are not H1N1 
http://www patentlens net/sequence/blast/blast html
I use BLAST for my work on a regular basis and I would ignore with results giving e-values above 0 001 as insignificant 

So no there's nothing in that patent linked directly to novel H1N1 except for homology to 22 bp of the 847 bp making up segment 8 (NS) 

Direct evidence of novel H1N1 in a patent would need to fulfill two requirements:
1) sequences with high homology to all gene segments (8 of which are protein codine) found in novel H1N1
2) those segments assembled together into one virion

Go here and paste in segments and it will list patents with the closest homologies:

http://www patentlens net/sequence/blast/blast html

Studies have shown that people born before 1950 are more likely to have some immunity against H1N1 as they have been exposed to viruses in the past that share some molecular similarities to today's strain  While these pre-existing antibodies do not by any means convey total immunity against H1N1 along with their decreased exposure to the virus (most are no longer in the workforce and come into contact with less strangers throughout the day) seniors are far less likely to be infected by this virus  Data from the states have shown the following age distribution of those infected by this virus:
* 0 to 4 years — 22 9%
* 5 to 24 years — 26 7%
* 25 to 49 years — 6 97%
* 50 to 64 years — 3 9%
* ?65 years — 1 3%

In mass vaccination programs officials have the duty of doing the most good with the limited resources they have  They acknowledge that the illness has the potential to be more serious in seniors but from the stats they are working with this will be a far less likely occurrence  With regards to differentiating between seniors with chronic medical conditions and those without this simply isn't possible since the vast majority of seniors suffer from some form of chronic illness (diabetes hypertension COPD etc)

at 11:38 AM ETA few points for the 'it's just another flu' crowd 

- It's a mild flu for the healthy but is killing people who would not have succumbed to seasonal flu  For example significant proportion of the deaths are young people with asthma 
- Resistance is low this means the infection rate will be substantially higher  It will also spread faster  There is an enormous societal impact if 20 to 30 per cent of the population all get sick at the same time  Further even if the mortality rate is the same as seasonal flu if the infection rate is higher then total number of deaths will be higher 
- At this moment the total number of flu cases resembles seasonal flu except that seasonal flu peaks mid winter  The case count is still climbing 

None of this is to say we should be panicking but we should be prudent  For example my wife and I both are currently recovering from the flu  I stayed out of my kids school on opening day because I did not know if I was still contagious or not

Jonathan Smith  wrote:Posted 2009/10/31
at 1:10 AM ETThe NVIC is asking whether the states are prepared to obey vaccine safety provisions in the 1986 National Childhood Vaccine Injury Act which include: 1  Giving parents written information about vaccine benefits and risks before children are vaccinated 2  Keeping a record of which vaccines the children get including the manufacturer’s name and lot number 3  Recording which vaccines were given in the child’s medical record and 4  Recording serious health problems that develop after vaccination in the child’s medical record and immediately making a report to the federal Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System 

NVIC also wants to know if the states are prepared to provide financial compensation to children injured by the swine flu vaccines whether parents will be given “complete truthful information about swine flu vaccine risks” and have the right to say “no” to vaccination 

Co-founder and president of NVIC Barbara Loe Fisher said [6]: “Parents and legislators should be asking themselves right now: Why are children the first to get experimental swine flu vaccines? Catgirl4e wrote:Posted 2009/05/09
at 11:46 AM ETAlthough some of you are skeptical about the swine flu you shouldn't write it off as part of some great conspiracy plot by the drug companies 

The swine flu HAS been seen in the past and it has existed for a long time however it seems to have become more virulent  I do however agree that it is important to look at this information critically  The original outbreak was in Mexico which is densely populated and therefore the transmission of such a virus occurs fairly rapidly  Then there is the question of access to proper health care and diagnosing  All of these factors and more have contributed to the spread of the virus in Mexico and its mortality rate 

Nonetheless  it is extremely important that each individual do their part to protect themselves and those around them  Its as simple as washing your hands and staying home if you are sick  Any travels to Mexico should be reconsidered and visits to the emergency rooms should only be done in an emergency  When it comes to washing your hands you can never do it too often  Using regular soap is fine and use a little bit of force (like scrubbing)  Make sure to moisturize your hands from the frequent washing to avoid cracking of dry skin (which can make you more vulnerable to bacteria and viruses)  People with asthma and other underlying medical conditions may have a particularly difficult time battling the virus for which reason taking these precautions is very important  Finally the regular flu virus claims thousands of lives every year in Canada  These simple guidelines can help you dodge any infection

at 4:15 PM ETMercury Toxicity and Vaccines  Symptoms resemble mercury toxicity  The symptoms of autism are very similar to the symptoms of mercury poisoning  Six-month old children today receive over 100 times the safe dose of mercury for their age due to vaccines 

The first case of autism occurred in 1943 in America twelve years after a mercury-containing preservative thimerosal was added to the whooping cough (pertussis) vaccine  In the 1950s with only four recommended vaccines the incidence of autism was 1 in 10000 children 

As more vaccines were recommended the incidence of autism increased dramatically  By 1981 children received 135 micrograms of mercury in vaccines  The incidence of autism increased to 1 in 2600 children  Children in 1996 received 246 micrograms of mercury in vaccines and the incidence of autism was about 1 in every 350 children 

Today 13 vaccines are recommended with varying numbers of booster shots  The number of shots ranges from 50 to over 100 in some areas  The incidence of autism now averages about 1 in every 150 children by some estimates and shows little evidence of decline 

Children who receive vaccinations containing thimerosal have six times the amount of autism as those who received a vaccine free of thimerasol  The majority of autism symptoms begin after a vaccination

VasDeferens wrote:Posted 2009/05/07
at 1:25 AM ETThere are 3 types of Influenza virus (all of which are RNA viruses belonging to the viral family known as Orthomyxoviridae):

1  human influenza (Influenza A and Influenza B along with H2N2 H3N2
H7N7 H1N2 H9N2 H7N2 H7N3 and H10N7 )
2  avian influenza (H5N1)
3  swine influenza (H1N1)

The H = hemagglutinin (a surface glycoprotein) and the N = neuraminidase (an enzyme that cleaves glycosidic linkages on neuraminic acid) 

With the all of the above stated it is worth nothing that there are some common unifying properties of the Influenza viruses chief among which is that they all are transmitted almost EXCLUSIVELY (despite extremely rare reported instances of transmission via saliva blood etc ) via aerosols from coughing sneezing etc  and form primary infections of the respiratory system (esp  the lungs) which often leads to pneumonia which may lead to death in extreme cases  With H1N1 in mind it is absolutely critical that one understands that pork has nothing to do with getting swine flu 

Touching raw pig meat eating raw pig meat (why would anyone do this anyways?) handling raw pig meat or their blood etc  and touching/handling/eating cooked pig meat all are unrelated to swine flu transmission and you absolutely will NOT develop pneumonia if you simply throw a raw pork chop on the barbecue 

Unless a pig coughs or sneezes on you or someone who inhaled the viral aerosol of H1N1 from a pig that sneezed / coughed on them sneezes or coughs on you who then does this to someone else who in turn does this to someone else etc  you will NOT get the swine flu  Everyone should just settle down

watglen wrote:Posted 2009/07/29
at 8:19 PM ETI would like to add a bit of detail for the uninformed reader 

The US program called COOL(country of origin labeling) is a program intended to give more information to the US consumer about the food they eat (think 'product of canada' honey from China to get the idea)  On the surface it sounds like a perfectly reasonable program  But there are practical limitations at the packing plant  Specifically segregating the millions of pigs killed each week at US packing plants into Canadian and American is logistically impossible (so we are told)  So the US packers decided the simplest solution was to stop buying Canadian hogs Canadian being defined as either born or raised in Canada 

Of course this comes on the heels of a long period of Canadian production expansion erected to supply these same US packers  They liked our pigs because we had superior health genetics and when the dollar was low price  Since COOL came into effect all that capacity is no longer needed in Canada 

Unfortunately there is a lot of money owed to a lot of lenders against this production capacity (barns) and the only way to recover all that debt is to raise hogs in them  So the entire industry is in a catch 22 position 

Problem 2 is the fact that my brand spanking new $1000000 hog barn (a good starter facility) is virtually worthless on the market  But you still owe $975000?!

This is the position that 90% of the hog sector is in right now  There are no easy fixes to this mess  Whats more the US industry is eager to see our industry disappear 

What can you do? Ask your grocer for Canadian pork  Costco pork is US pork  Sobeys pork is sourced mostly out of Ontario

http://uk reuters com/article/topNews/idUKTRE53R1PO20090428
Container of swine virus explodes on Swiss train
9 hours 33 mins ago - (Reporting by Sven Egenter (Reuters); Editing by Laura MacInnis)


A container of flu virus samples packed in dry ice exploded on a Swiss train injuring one person but posing no other risks to humans police said on Tuesday 
The box held vials of swine flu virus although a different strain than the H1N1 variety that has caused about 150 deaths in Mexico and infected people in the United States Canada Spain and Britain 
A technician was transporting the container on Monday night to the Swiss national flu centre in Geneva where scientists are developing a flu test for humans police said 
One woman was hurt when the box exploded in reaction to the dry ice used to keep the samples cold 
After consulting virus specialists the police decided to stop the St  Gallen to Geneva train before it entered the station in Lausanne 
The virus specialists confirmed that the samples being transported posed no risks to humans police said

A thinking man   wrote:Posted 2009/04/28
at 2:26 PM ETOn the flu in general Canadians are just uninformed about the flu  Any old regular flu kills people every year in Canada that is why the government and health officials try so hard each year to get Canadians to be immunized against the flu 

Yes the Swine flu poses a threat just like any other contagious illness but media hype is currently blown out of proportion 

Having said that though you have to recognize that the threat is managed and balanced against other risks by PROFESSIONAL health care specialists 

The woman in a Mexican hospital that the ICU units in Ontario won't accept is really pretty straight forward  If the swine flu was introduced to an ICU it could kill the majority of patients in there because of their weakened state  On the other hand the woman is being treated in a Mexican hospital where on many measures the level of treatment that she is likely receiving is better than what she will get here (I have had a critically ill family member treated in Mexico and can say that the overall care that he received in a private medical hospital paid for by travel insurance was superior to the treatment that he received here in Canada when we managed to get him home) 

Everything is a BALANCE of risks vs benefits  We let Canadians return from Mexican vacations because the risk is less than the hardship and problems that would be caused by blocking them  We allow Canadians to still go on their Mexican vacations because the inconvenience and financial loss to thousands of Canadians would be worse than the minimal risk of importing a few cases of flu 

Get used to it  Life is about balancing risk  If you think you can do it better apply for the job and see how you compare against the experts who have the difficult job of making these decisions

10 Responses to “Is there thimerosal in the H1N1 vaccine?”

   1  Marni Says:

      Is Thimerosol and mercury the same thing? How much perservative is in the vaccines?
   2  Jill Says:
      November 5th 2009 at 2:33 pm

      I was really worried to get my son the vaccination before  He is 16 months old and i wasnt sure what could happen to him if he got it since its a new vaccine 
      This article is reassuring that it is a good idea to get it 
      I think the the protection from the vaccine will outweigh the risk of getting it 
      Also since I’m not a stay at home mom I am more likely to get it and pass it to him and also him get it from the daycare so I feel that women with their children exposed to the public alot should highly consider getting vaccinated 
   3  Lindsay Says:
      November 6th 2009 at 11:29 am

      Hi Marni - Thanks for your question  Thimerosal is a preservative that does contain a small amount of mercury  While higher doses of certain forms of mercury may affect brain development the IOM review concludes that thimerosal-containing vaccines do not 
   4  Lindsay Says:
      November 6th 2009 at 11:30 am

      Jill you’re right  If your child is in daycare the exposure risk is much higher  Thanks for your comments 
   5  Dr  Pedre Says:
      November 15th 2009 at 12:50 am

      I’m concerned about the statements here with regards to the safety of Thimerosal in vaccines  The amount in the vaccines may be small but the amount that the EPA and the CDC considers safe for daily exposure is in micrograms — quite small  Thimerosal is ethylmercury which is an inorganic form of merucry however some of this will be converted to methylmercury by the body and then it has no way of getting back out  For a developing fetus you have to consider that the level of exposure is much greater than in an adult body as its volume of distribution is much smaller  At EPA acceptable levels the amount of mercury in the vaccine is too much for a fetus  In fact if you read the vaccine package insert (readily available on the FDA website) you will see flu vaccines are considered a Category C in pregnancy  This means it has never been tested in pregnant women and therefore its safety is not known for sure 
   6  Lindsay Says:
      November 17th 2009 at 2:46 pm

      Hi Dr  Pedre  Thank you for visiting News Moms Need 

      It’s important to note that the seasonal flu vaccine has been around for many years been given to pregnant women and shown to be safe for most women during pregnancy  Millions of Americans including pregnant women get the seasonal flu vaccine each year without any problems  The H1N1 flu vaccines are made in the same way as the seasonal one  To be doubly careful National Institutes of Health (NIH) and the vaccine makers have conducted more rigorous tests on the H1N1 vaccine than they normally do on other flu vaccines  The clinical trials which included testing on pregnant women have shown that the new H1N1 vaccine is both safe and effective for pregnant women and babies  Several prominent health organizations such as the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists (ACOG) the American College of Nurse Midwives (ACNM) and the American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) have each recommended that pregnant women and children get both the seasonal and H1N1 flu vaccines 

      The thimerosal used in some flu vaccines is in a very small amount  In fact the amount of mercury in vaccines with thimerosal is less than what babies normally get through breastmilk or infant formula  As I mention in my post medical experts from the Institutes of Medicine (IOM) have thoroughly researched the issue and concluded that thimerosal-containing vaccines are NOT associated with autism 

      You’re correct that the U S  Food and Drug Administration (FDA) assigns a letter grade (A B C D X) to prescription medications and treatments  In general most medications and treatments are not tested on pregnant women in a traditional setting (clinical trials studies etc )  However a category C medication or treatment doesn’t necessarily mean it’s unsafe for pregnant women  As the FDA notes the benefits of a category C medication or treatment during pregnancy may outweigh any risks  And that’s what pregnant women need to keep in mind –the benefits of both the seasonal flu and H1N1 flu vaccines on you and your baby’s health far outweigh any potential risk

      No mother or child should receive the flu vaccine or swine flu vaccine when it comes available  There are 14 5 to 25 micrograms of mercury in flu vaccines  One microgram is considered toxic  In receiving flu vaccines will increase your infants chance of developing autism ADHD asthma and other neurological disorders  Keep your immune system strong by eating healthy food taking quality supplements and getting plenty of sleep 
   3  Pam Says:
      August 3rd 2009 at 1:48 pm

      Dear Deborah:

      Flu vaccines are now available without mercury  So if you or others are concerned please ask your health care provider for a mercury-free vaccine  A mercury-free version of the swine flu vaccine will be available 

      You raise an important issue that has been much debated  Several years ago some people were concerned that vaccines containing a preservative with mercury might be linked to autism and other health conditions 

      Since that time much research has been done  A large majority of health experts now believe that such preservatives do not pose a serious health risk  At the same time manufacturers have started making mercury-free vaccines 

      When considering any medical treatment we have to weigh the risks and benefits  Almost all medical professionals believe the benefits of vaccines outweigh the risks they carry  Vaccines prevent very serious diseases that can be life-threatening 

      To learn more about this issue please read:
      * Mercury and Pregnancy on the March of Dimes Web site http://www marchofdimes com/pnhec/159_15759 asp

      * Vaccinations During Pregnancy http://www marchofdimes com/pnhec/159_16189 asp

      * Immunizations: Your Baby’s Shots http://www marchofdimes com/pnhec/298_9087 asp

      * Autism http://www marchofdimes com/professionals/14332_25619 asp

      * Mercury and Vaccines from the U S  Centers for Disease Control and Prevention http://www cdc gov/vaccinesafety/updates/thimerosal htm

@newtonxx
À votre gouverne cet adjuvant se nomme aussi adjuvant AS03 L’adjuvant AS03 est un amplificateur d’effet qui consiste en un mélange de squalène de polysorbate et de vitamine E  C'est ce type qui a été utilisé en 1976 afin de contrer une pandémie (qui n'a pas eu lieu) de grippe porcine   

Pourriez-vous partagez avec nous votre source selon laquelle l'adjuvant AS03 ou un autre adjuvant à base de squalène aurait été utilisé en 1976?

Il semblerait plutôt que les premiers vaccins grippaux avec adjuvant à base de squalène (MF59 dans ce cas) ont été développés dans les années 1990 (chez Ciba-Geigy et Chiron) et l'un d'eux est utilisé en Europe depuis 1997 sans aucun problème reporté  AS03 est un adjuvant est encore plus récent qui a été testé chez environ 45 000 personnes  Il est intéressant de noter que le squalène est une substance naturelle chez l'homme produite par le foie et propagée dans le système sanguin 

Quant au fameux vaccin de 1976 je croyais qu'il ne contenait pas d'adjuvant? Je n'arrive pas à confirmer ceci mais quelqu'un d'autre pourrait-il m'éclairer à ce sujet?

Je ne doute pas de votre bonne foi mais plutôt de la validité de vos sources

Faut pas comparer des pommes et des oranges  Le méthode moderne pour développer le vaccin contre l'influenza (utilisant des oeufs de poule pour produire des virus inactivés) a été développée dans les années 40  À chaque année il s'agit de répéter le processus avec les souches saisonnières pour créer un vaccin efficace  Ce qui est compliqué ça n'est pas de produire un vaccin efficace c'est d'en produire en quantité suffisante pour répondre aux besoins 

Le VIH c'est une autre paire de manche il joue à cache-cache avec le système immunitaire il a un taux de mutation si élevé que l'on voit l'apparition de plusieurs variantes du VIH dans un même individu en une seule journée  Donc toute tentative de vaccination échoue puisque même si l'on réussit à stimuler le système immunitaire l'empreinte du vaccin ne correspond plus à celle du virus dans l'individu  Pour l'influenza on n'a pas ce problème: le virus reste plutôt le même sur une longue période

Le squalène est un lipide naturellement produit par l'humain(et autres bestioles D ) Cependant celui qu'on tente de nous induire ne l'est pas bien qu'il soit animal 
C'est le contenu total de l'adjuvant utilisé dans la vaccination qui m'inquiète 

(polysorbate 80 ?-tocopherol et squalène)
Autres Ingrédients:Octoxynol 10Sodium chlorideDisodium phosphatePotassium dihydrogen phosphatePotassium chlorideMagnesium chlorideThiomersalEau pour injections 

source European Medicines Agency Evaluation of Medicines for Human Use:
http://www emea europa eu/humandocs/PDFs/EPAR/pandemrix/H-832-en6 pdf

Dans la section toxicology à la page 11 il est noté que Glaxo-Smith-Kline avoue que l'adjuvant AS03 à des effets nocifs sur les foetus de rats et que cela est assez évident pour démontrer sa toxicité 

Ainsi il est évident et même reconnu par Glaxo-Smith-Kline que cet adjuvant est toxique en ce qui concerne les dangers pour nos enfants GSK répond par un silence assourdissant 

Mais GSK reconnait que l'adjuvant AS03 provoque un délai dans le développement neurologique chez les animaux

Pour un certificat de garantie- Copier/Coller
http://cozop com/internaute_choix_realite_org/certificat_de_garantie_vaccin_h1n1
Devant la menace de pandémie aviaire H1N1 les autorités sanitaires recommandent la vaccination pour tous  Avant d’accepter cette vaccination je souhaite dans le respect de la législation en vigueur recevoir du corps médical une information claire transparente et appropriée ainsi que l’assurance que le dit vaccin est sans danger conformément { l’obligation de prudence rappelée par la directive communautaire du droit de la consommation du 25 juillet 1985 qui « dispose qu’un produit est défectueux lorsqu’il n’offre pas la sécurité { laquelle on peut légitimement s’attendre  » 

J’entends donc recevoir l’assurance par le médecin que :

- la vaccination ne pourra en aucun cas activer des fonctions effectrices inappropriées

- ce vaccin est totalement dépourvu d’ADN contaminant hétérogène

- ce vaccin ne pourra entraîner ni altérations chromosomiques ni mutations ni retour du virus à la virulence

- qu’aucun variant des virus vaccinaux { action pathogène ne pourra se produire par le phénomène de complémentation ou de recombinaison

- que cette stimulation antigénique n’entraînera pas de perturbation de mon système immunitaire notamment une modification transitoire ou prolongée du rapport T4/T8 comme cela a déjà été observé (cf  M  Eihl J  Mannhalter G  Zlabinger New England Journal of Medecine vol 310 de 1984)

- que la vaccination n’exercera aucune action pathogène sur l’équilibre endocrinien (notamment la survenue de diabète comme c’est le cas avec le vaccin anti-hépatite B cf Pr  Barthelow Classen New Zealand Medical Journal 24 mai 1996) et le statut humoral

- que l’éventuelle persistance virale ne pourra être la cause d’aucune maladie auto-immune ni d’aucune altération du système nerveux central

- qu’aucune réaction allergique aux divers adjuvants des vaccins ne pourra se produire

__- que je ne risque pas de présenter une myofasciite à macrophages laquelle peut apparaître dans un délai de quelques semaines { plus de trente ans après toute vaccination faisant appel { l’hydroxyde d’aluminium (cf  Gherardi et all  “Macrophagic myofasciitis : a reaction to intramuscular injections of aluminium containing vaccines” in Journal of Neurology n° 246 1999)  Il en est de même pour le MF 59 utilisé par le laboratoire Novartis__(suite prochain mail)

PARTIE I / II

La communaute scientifique n'est pas convaincu que la grippe H1N1 est la priorite des virus a combattre  Cette sorte de virus infuenza n'est pas dangereux  Ils disent que les medecins ont ete mal informes 

Ce qu'il faut retenir avant de lire la suite:

0- Si ce virus etait dangeureux on aurait declare l'etat d'urgence mettre des gens en quarantaine bloquer des frontieres  ON AURAIT SUTROUT PAS ENCOURAGER LES GENS A ALLER L'ALLOWEEN!!!
1- L'influenza ne represente que 7% des deces causes par virus
2- L'OMS vient de changer la definition de ce c'est une Pandemie
3- Le H1N1 a un taux de mortalite inferieur a la grippe saisonniere
4- Les gens atteints du H1N1 meurent d'un facteur secondaire dont probalement une infection baterienne 
5- La grippe Espagnole a ete causee par le H1N1  Cependant les scientifiques ne sont pas certains des causes de deces car on ne savait pas soigner une simple infection bacterienne a l'epoque  Aussi c'etait la guerre les moyens manquaient et les gens etaient mal nourris mal chauffes    
6- Le vaccin est deconseille par le prix Nobel de medecine de 2006 
7- L'hivers vient de se terminer en Australie  Le H1N1 a tue moins de gens qu'une simple grippe saisonniere 
8- En Aout/2009 le Canada a assure les pharmaceutique qu'il n'y aura pas de poursuites en cas de pepins  Les USAs l'ont fait depuis 2001 
9- Le gouvernement Tcheque a refuse le vaccin conte le H1N1  A vous de chercher les raison
10- 4 deces suite a la vaccination contre le H1N1 en Suede? (a confirmer)


BONNE LECTURE POUR LA SUITE    


Selon des etudes publiees recemment par Tom Jefferson l'influza ne represente que 7% des deces causes par virus  Il dit que c'est de l'argent facile qui est gagne par les pharmaceutiques  Tom Jefferson est un expert en epidimilogies reconnu mondialement  Sante Canada par exemple fait pleins de reference a ces publications 

Aussi le prix Nobel de Médecine et Physiologie 2006 pense qu'on ne doit pas vacciner contre la grippe:
http://www mondialisation ca/index php?context=va&aid=3995

La grippe saisonniere normale cause un taux de mortalite de 1/1000 a 2000 personnes parmis les personnes infectees  La H1N1 a tue a son maximum 1/14000

@ mrkmni

Ils ont eu peur que ce virus mute  Ok s'il mute est ce que le vaccin serait efficace 
NON  

Erreur  Tu aurais intérêt à te renseigner un peu plus sur la matière  Ce qui mute dans le virus c'est la machinerie interne qui détermine sa virulence et l'intensité de ses symptômes  Le vaccin lui stimule la produit d'anticorps qui visent à inhiber l'agglutinine présente sur la surface du virus ce qui fait que ce dernier ne peut se fixer aux cellules et ainsi l'infecter  Même si la machinerie interne mute les anticorps sont encore appropriés pour inhiber l'agglutinine sur le virus qui ne change pas 



Pour ceux qui scandent que ce vaccin était inutile: N'avez-vous jamais pensé que si la propagation du virus était limitée c'était à cause des mesures mises en place telles que le vaccin? En gros vous profitez du fait que les autres plus responsables se sont fait vacciner et ne vous ont ainsi rien transmis 

De plus la vaccination est loin d'être inutile  Elle permet d'éviter d'avoir à souffrir des symptômes grippaux et de perdre une semaine de travail inutilement  Est-ce qu'une petite piqure vaut la peine pour éviter une semaine de maladie? Oui définitivement

Il est grand temps que ça finisse et que l'on cesse de gaspiller des ressources et du personnel pour cette campagne ridicule de vaccination massive pour un virus passablement inoffensif 

Le personnel médical est au bout du rouleau et les ressources manquent gravement alors passons rapidement à autre chose et occupons nous des gens vraiment malades dans les corridors des urgences 

Une chance que ce virus n'était pas dangereux car au départ le simple fait de rassembler des personnes à risque dans des endroits clos ou ils respirent l'air que les autres expirent et de les faire attendre pendant des heures pour les vacciner est le meilleur moyen de propager un virus comme celui de la grippe qui se transmet très bien par voie aérienne 

La grippe ne se transmet pas en donnant la main à son voisin ni sur les bols de toilette cela s'applique surtout aux bactéries 
N'importe quel étudiant en médecine de première année sait cela 
Les virus de grippe se transmettent principalement en respirant des gouttelettes contaminées qui flottent dans l'air et qui sont émises par la toux de personnes infectées 

La dérive sécuritaire  des autorités sanitaires ministre en tête m'inquiète beaucoup et en dit long sur ceux qui nous gouvernent et leur compétence 

Cette nouvelle tactique de propagande utilisée abondamment par les autorités sanitaires qui consiste à culpabiliser systématiquement quiconque décide de ne pas se faire vacciner est aussi très inquiétante et dangereuse à mon avis 

Sans oublier les menaces au personnel et aux médecins qui avaient des doutes sur l'opportunité de cette campagne 

En terminant la presse qui est supposée être un rempart de la démocratie a montré de grandes faiblesses dans ce dossier en se faisant plus un organe de propagande des autorités que du vrai travail journalistique de recherche mise en perspective et comparaisons aux années précédentes 

Ensuite messieurs dames journalistes vous vous demanderez pourquoi de plus en plus les gens délaissent les médias traditionnels

&stradart

C'est exact ce sont toutes les combinaisons possibles je sais que cela ne dit rien à la population en général mais chaque virus a un nom spécifique 

Avant 1918 c'était surtout les virus de type A(H2N8) et A(H3N8) qui circulaient ils étaient de souche aviaire porcine mais aussi chevaline 

Mais le virus A(H1N1) existait déjà au début des années 1900 en 1915 il était apparu puis à l'hiver 1917-1918 il frappait le Canton de Chine très contagieux
mais il ressemblait encore à une grippe saisonnière 
Un bataillon de soldats américains rentrant à leur base à Boston et des Chinois qui immigraient en grande quantité aux É U  en Caroline du Sud ont emméné le virus avec eux même que les porcs étaient contaminés par la grippe 

La première vague de mars 1918 à juin 1918 mais déjà il y avait eu plusieurs cas avant qu'on parle d'épidémie ressemblait à une grippe sasionnière mais la grippe ne s'est jamais arrêtée finalement 

La deuxième vague a débuté fin août 1918 c'est surtout vers le milieu de sept  1918 que les cas de grippe sont devenus extrêmement virulents c'est à ce moment qu'on a commencé à compter les morts 
En 7 jours elle avait traversé les É U  et en 15 jours l'Amérique du Nord au grand complet  Le port du masque a fait son apparrition 
En oct  1918 la contamination a atteint son apogée la mort pouvaient survenir en quelques jours et parfois même en quelques heures des jeunes gens surtout et en bonne santé décédaient de pneumonies bronchites bronchiolites chez les jeunes enfants provoquaient la suffocation 

Au bout de 2 mois l'épidémie s'est un peu essoufflée seul l'Australie n'avait pas été touchée 

La troisième vague de mars 1919 à juin 1920 une recrudescendence de la grippe et cette vague a de nouveau balayée la planète surtout les régions épargnée

Oui c'est une question de gestion de risques  C'est juste qu'il y a une inconnue dans cette équation: les effets à long terme 

Le syndrome de Guillain-Barré fait partie des effets indésirables qui se manifestent assez rapidement après la vaccination  Les seuls effets secondaires mesurés dans les études cliniques sur les vaccins sont ceux à court terme (généralement pas plus de six) sur des sujets adultes généralement en bonne santé  La grande aberration scientifique dans tout ça c'est que depuis des décennies qu'on vaccine ni les fabricants de vaccins ni les autorités de santé publique n'ont jamais jugé bon de vérifier sur le terrain l'hypothèse que les vaccins sont sécuritaires à long terme par des études cliniques méthodologiquement dignes de ce nom 

* Le mercure est une substance neuro-toxique qui traverse les barrières placentaire et sang-cerveau
* l'aluminium est toxique entre autres pour le système nerveux et les reins
* les adjuvants de type émulsion huile/eau (même si c'est juste de la vitamine E) comme le AS03 sont reconnus comme étant dévastateurs pour le système immunitaire  Ils sont utilisés sur les animaux de laboratoire pour leur provoquer des maladies auto-immunes    Ses effets à long terme sont inconnus puisqu'injectés aux humains depuis quelques années seulement 

On vous injecte des substances scientifiquement reconnues toxiques pour le cerveau et le système immunitaire à répétition sans en mesurer les effets à long terme ou même quelle idée saugrenue leur interaction entres elles ou avec une condition physique préalable  Les troubles envahissants de développement chez les enfants sont en progression alarmantes à un taux d'un enfant sur 166  Les maladies auto-immunes plus de 80 répertoriées affectent chroniquement 5 à 8% de la population 

Pourtant on se moque des scientifiques qui émettent l'hypothèse qu'il pourrait y avoir des liens entre ces problèmes et les vaccins de plus en plus nombreux   

Mais rassurez-vous disent les bons docteurs «c'est notre domaine on connaît ça faites-vous vacciner!» Les femmes les enfants et les immuno-supprimés d'abord!   

BRAVO aux «spin doctors» qui ont habilement fait bifurquer le débat de la pertinence et la sécurité du vaccin à la gestion de cette non-crise

Je trouve cela bien drôle quand on compare une grippe au bogue de l'an 2000
le SRAS ou la grippe aviaire   

La crainte du bogue de 2000 a peut-être été perçu par certaines personnes comme la fin du monde mais c'est une minorité qui ont cru cela   on a juste changer de siècle 
Le SRAS (syndrome respiratoire aigu sévère) qui n'est pas un virus de grippe même si il affecte les poumons étaient très contagieux et beaucoup plus mortel que la grippe en général  Le nom le dit bien sévère 
On a pris les grands moyens quanrantaine que ça plaise ou non !
Il existe plusieurs maladies respiratoires qui ne sont dues à la grippe et qui causent plein de problèmes sérieux et même mortels la tuberculose a fait de nombreuses victimes mais ce n'était pas une grippe 
On a pas parlé du SRAS pendant plusieurs mois avant que cela arrive comme
on le fait présentement avec la grippe A(H1N1) alors que la pandémie est annoncée depuis plusieurs mois 

La grippe aviaire n'a jamais été une vraie menace pour les humains en général elle a fait peu de victimes en comparaison avec les autres grippes les véritables victimes étaient les poulets et ça c'est passé dans les poulaillers si on ne avait pas tué tous ces poulets ou volailles seraient mortes quand même de la grippe 
Le danger avec la grippe aviaire était pour les gens en contact direct avec les poulets pas pour la population humaine cette grippe extrêmement virulente et voir mortelle pour la grande majorité de ceux qui l'ont attrappée mais elle ne transmettait d'humain à humain 
Si elle devient un jour une grippe humaine ce serait avec la manipualtion des hommes !
La grippe est semble-t-il une des vieilles maladies du monde depuis plus de 40 ans on vaccine les plus à risque dit-on les personnes âgées et les personnes avec des maladies chroniques mais cela n'a jamais empêché les gens de mourir de la grippe même des vaccinés et les cas de grippe ne diminuent aucunement car la population change très vite 

Bien sûr qu'aujourd'hui les soins de santé sont différents que dans les années 1918 1957-1968 et même 1976 lors des autres épidémies mais elle peut encore tuer car elle est surnoise et quand elle frappe on est pas toujours dans nos meilleures conditions généralement en hiver ou d'autres infections circulent
rhumes ce n'est pas parce qu'on a pas de maladies chroniques ou autres gros problèmes de santé qu'on est néssairement en super forme et non vulnérable à un virus

Tuesday April 28 2009 09:37 AM ET
Good coverage but short on the science 

This is a good synopsis of the 1976 event - but you might be forgetting that this was only 50 years after the 1918 influenza that killed about 100 million people worldwide and pretty much everyone who was an adult had been impacted in some form or fashion by that epidemic 

Private Lewis showed influenza in his lung tissue after the autopsy  There was no way at the time to determine whether it was a similar strain to 1918 or not as no one anywhere on the globe had recovered and sequenced the genetic code for the 1918 strain 

The author is correct however that the main concern the Ford administration had was whether 1976 was going to be another 1918  The science establishment at the time had no clue what the 1918 flu looked like or even where it originated and the government's overreaction to a single death was made with many forgivable lapses in general knowledge  Among them:

* Stockpiling enough vaccine would take 9-12 months  The 1918 epidemic did all of its damage in the course of about three 

* Ford had no dissenting voices among his science cabinet when the decision was made  It was judged a prudent effort and they went ahead 

* The vaccination of fifty million people was predicted by the CDC to result in coincidental relationships (such as the false linking of Giullian-Barre syndrome) between vaccination and sickness  This was considered an acceptable risk at the time 

* 1976 was on the right point in time to coincide with pandemic influenza - the cycle time was correct for a highly-infectious version to appear (it cycles over the course of about two decades between very innocuous and highly infectious) 

* To the best of their knowledge Mr  Matthews was correct - if the 1976 flu was a match for 1918 it would kill a million people 

Today's flu situation is a little different - for example we now have a complete genome of the 1918 flu and can see what made it so lethal  Prevailing theory holds that it was an avian variety that somehow managed to not only jump species to humans but also was able to retain that foothold and thrive in human tissue - something that avian flu does not normally have the capacity to do 

At the present time we have knowledge of many of the effects of 1918's abilities such as an enhanced ability to suppress cellular production of interferon - which makes it much harder for us to fight it off  We also are familiar with its structural nature that 1918 was an H1 variety (H1 referring to a type of hemagluttenin protein on its surface there are many types each referred to by H# to differentiate them in recordkeeping)  Highly virulent forms are generally of the H1 variety (major pandemics are most often of this type) though exceptions will likely occur 

What I'm getting at here is that yes - Obama's administration will be forced to decide a difficult choice on whether or not to launch a massive campaign to immunize against this strain  However today as opposed to 1976 the administration will have access to much more detailed and reliable information regarding the nature of the flu at hand  Given this administration's leanings towards good science Obama will have have the luxury of taking advantage of that information whereas Ford did not 

My apologies for the following but I must point out a particularly salient political point here  Retrospectively we can thank our gods/stars/countrymen that the blissfully ignorant McCain and that bumbling fool Palin are not in the White House - because they would likely have slid any report regarding a potential epidemic into the same circular file that the prior administration slid the report regarding Osama bin Laden being determined to attack from within the United States  It is precisely because of the Republican aversion to good science that they should be eradicated from the American political theater 

So before you go vote in the mid-terms think about that very very carefully  Without science we are terribly vulnerable to a great many hidden and surprising foes in nature  Republicans have repeatedly and faithfully (no pun intended) demonstrated an abhorrence of science since it often conflicts with their fantasy-land ideology  That's not to say Democrats are perfect but they have at least shown they are willing look at the numbers and re-evaluate their position based on fact (as opposed to flip-flopping randomly to appease voting blocks)  Consider the position of the candidates whenever you go to vote  Because in the end you must bring yourself to the realization:

Your own vote can kill you 

T
—Thomas Theobald Read Thomas Theobald's other letters

During the Spanish influenza epidemic in 1918 the people who fared best were those being treated by homeopathic physicians who lost very few patients to a flu that was a genuine killer 

Homeopathy is brilliant with flu any kind or strain  Washington Homeopathic Pharmacy (http://www homeopathyworks com/ (I am not affiliated in any way) is an excellent source of information and products that can help a family stay healthy even if you have no health insurance at very affordable prices  Oscillococcinum produced by the Boiron pharmacy is a product available in most drugstores and supermarkets and if taken at the first sign of flu or even if you think you might have been exposed can prevent or greatly reduce symptoms 

A wonderful book if you can find it is Who Is Your Doctor And Why? by Alonzo Shadman  It tells the history of homeopathic medicine in the U S  and how it was almost wiped out by the burgeoning pharmaceutical industry in the early part of the 20th century much to the detriment of the country's health care  In most parts of the world homeopathy is an accepted part of standard medical care but in the U S  it has been relegated to the fringes  A real shame  The royal family of England has a homeopathic physician as their primary care giver  Say what you will of them but they do live a long time barring accident 

The downside of homeopathy is that it requires you to take responsibility for your own health  Many people really do not want to do that  They want to go to a doctor and be told what to do and to take some drug and not have to think about it  I prefer the former but recognize that it's not for everyone  Another consideration is that most homeopathic remedies are antidoted (stopped in their action) by mint  Many people have taken a remedy at bedtime right before or after brushing their teeth with a mint toothpaste and have concluded that homeopathy just doesn't work  So if you are going to use this method of healing consider a non-mint toothpaste  Most health food stores and Trader Joe's as well carry fennel toothpastes that will not interfere with homeopathic remedies 

So - if you decide to forego the flu shots - I personally don't bother with them - and don't have the money or inclination for anti-virals like Tamiflu - you may consider homeopathy as a way to deal with this and any other outbreak 

Cheers

One other thing   

During a typical year in the United States 30000 to 50000 persons die as a result of influenza viral infection  Frequently cited numbers are 20000 deaths each year and 37000 annual deaths  About 5-10% of hospitalizations for influenza lead to fatal outcome in adults 

http://www globalsecurity org/security/ops/hsc-scen-3_flu-pandemic-deaths htm

Thus one death and dozens of infections from an unusual strain of influenza in the U S  is not indication of a need to stockpile Tamiflu and Relenza - and it is still not clear that this strain is very unusual  Influenza is more dangerous for people with impaired immune systems and lungs and all the pollution in Mexico City means there is plenty of that 

The only people who really should take flu shots are the infirm elderly and people at high risk because of other medical conditions  As far as Tamiflu it should be restricted to use by doctors certainly not available over-the-counter - look at potential side effects:

    Seek medical attention right away if any of these SEVERE side effects occur when using Tamiflu:

Laura Owens :
Hi

I appreciate your comments  I encourage readers to refer to my sources/resources at the end of my article 

I also encourage open dialogue regarding the flu vaccines  There appears to be a mis-perception that groups are anti-vaccine  While some individuals/orgs ARE several consumer-based groups are simply interested in vaccination safety and presenting credible well-documented research results (and updates) 

All organizations government research and consumer-advocacy groups should post clear truthful and THOROUGH information  In turnthe invididual needs to do their homework  Check out the CDC/WHO and NIH websites  Talk to your doctor and review some of the vaccination-safety consumer sites (all at the end of my article) 

Make a choice based on the facts and what works for you and your family  While I know everyone is busy and doing this much homework seems impractical it's worth the effort  Take a couple hours one week and do it 

I can appreciate your point that there is only a VERY small chance the adjuvant will be added and if so only in the case of a pandemic 

I personally would not want any vaccine that had any adjuvant particularly squalene regardless of the fact that doing so allows manufacturers to maximize production/available doses (because less vaccine is needed to evoke the desired immune response in the individual) in the case of a shortage or pandemic 

While my personal philosophy on the seasonal and swine vaccine is to NOT get it (I prefer to boost my immune system and avoid people who are ill) this is based on a well-researched personal choice  I also however have zero risk factors 

My daughter received all her childhood vaccinations but will not get the the flu vaccines  She also won't be getting the Gardasil vaccine  Too new too many unknowns  I will also find out how she can get her 7th grade DTp with the least amount of preservative (thimerosal) possible 

As for the flu vaccines if I was pregnant or had a two year old or younger a child with risk factors I might re-consider  That being said I would INSIST on the preservative-free (single dose) dead virus form 

The public should do their own homework  Never blindly follow doctor or government recommendations always ask questions  As well do not follow consumer advocacy groups that seem unusually inflammatory and more importantly are not well-documented (backed by research )

Thanks for your time

Laura Owens :
Hi

To your question about adjuvant and squalene  Squalene is an oil-based form of an adjuvant and is NOT in the current swine or seasonal flu vaccines 

Only in the event of a pandemic when large doses would be needed quickly would the government add squalene  There ARE small trace amounts of the preservative thimerosal (mercury) in the injected multi-dose form of the swine flu vaccine not in the live nasal spray 

From the National Vaccination Information Center:

Thimerosal WILL be added as a preservative in multi-dose vials of most inactivated (injected) H1N1 swine flu vaccines although there reportedly will be a limited supply of single dose vials of inactivated swine flu vaccine that do not contain thimerosal 

The live virus nasal spray H1N1 vaccine being created by MedImmune will not contain the preservative thimerosal (and live virus swine flu vaccine will not contain an unlicensed adjuvant that may be added to inactivated H1N1 vaccines) 

Laura

R2G2: Typically viruses that are passed easily (ie  without a vector) evolve to become less virulent over time  The reason for this is that the advantage of rapid replication for the virus is outweighed by the fact that the victim is immobilized and thus tends not to spread the virus as much  Less virulent variants of the virus have a tendency to be propagated more readily because their victims continue to go to work go to school ride public transportation etcetera  There is an interesting literature on this  Of course in this case we have a virus that hasn't been in humans for very long and these are unpredictable  You are correct that it could mutate into something more consistently terrible but this is highly unlikely and if it occurred would not spread nearly as fast as a low virulence flu like the one causing panic around the world today  Simply put if people can't move around and there is no vector it can be more easily contained

On November 3 2009 more than 170 researchers public health officials and health practitioners met at the University of Toronto Faculty Club for a conference on the 'Diagnosis and Treatment of Vitamin D Deficiency   This was the largest gathering of vitamin D researchers held in North America this year 

The field of vitamin D research is exploding with more than 3000 academic papers published this year alone including a placebo/ vitamin D study on the incidence of colds and flu that showed that vitamin D supplementation dramatically reduces the incidence of colds and flu  The highest incidence of colds and flu was in the placebo group during winter the very time when vitamin D levels are at their lowest  The lowest incidence of colds and flu in the placebo group (which was significantly higher than the vitamin D supplemented group) was in the summer when vitamin D levels are highest due to vitamin D generated in the skin through sun exposure  Journal of American Physicians and Surgeon Volume 14 Number 2 Summer 2009

No study has ever been done in which vaccines have been tested against a placebo 


As much as 97% of Canadians are deficient in vitamin D  Only about 3% know what their blood levels of vitamin D are 

The headline of the story on the vitamin D conference was 'Eradicate Breast Cancer With Vitamin D?'  If the story had been about a new drug it would have made the front page of every paper  Yet it got almost zero media coverage 

Our health care bureaucrats have known for years that there is a serious epidemic of vitamin D deficiency that is having an enormous impact on the health of Canadians  H1N1 pales in comparison  So how is it that not only have our health bureaucrats ignored this issue for years but labs in the Maritimes are no longer doing 25-OH-D blood tests for vitamin D and medical professionals in BC are under a directive to not order this test  There is a reason

One thing that has not been made clear by the media or anyone else is that the seasonal flu death stats are ESTIMATES whereas (at least in Canada so far) the H1N1 death stats are lab-confirmed  And to be perfectly blunt after doing a LOT of investigation for the stats on seasonal flu death for my province of Alberta I have come to the conclusion that no one really has any hard data  We have all heard the oft-repeated 2000-4000-ish deaths from seasonal flu in Canada per year stat since Alberta has about 10% of the population a reasonable estimate would be 200-400 seasonal flu deaths per year  But if you go to the Alberta Health Services page and locate the Pandemic (H1N1) 2009 Response Plan report (blue button that'll open a pdf file) you'll find at the end of the second paragraph on page 7 the statement that Seasonal influenza results in about 17 deaths annually in Alberta    And then again a few days ago at a press conference Dr  Andre Corriveau (AB's main health official) said that seasonal flu has accounted for anywhere from 11 to 90 deaths per year in Alberta over the past number of years  Hmmmm    

Ok so according to the latest tally again found at the Alberta Health Services site Alberta has had 38 deaths (and 755 hospitalizations) as of Nov 13th from H1N1  So that 38 deaths is what? More than triple a low seasonal flu year of 11 deaths? More than double the 17 figure found in the Pandemic Response Plan report found on the same Alberta Health services website? Less than half the 90 of a bad seasonal flu year? But a small fraction of the expected 200-400 deaths from the oft-quoted Canadian death total estimate?

Makes it kinda difficult to say if this flu is more mild or more deadly than seasonal flu eh? Thanks for the context!

Roger Cooper
	  	
11/14/2009 10:45:22 AM
Excellent piece Caroline and Karen especially the graphic 

Comparing the seasonal flu with this new H1N1 variant is like comparing apples and oranges or more precisely like comparing every known variety of apple against an orange since what is called 'seasonal flu' is actually a group of more than 200 viruses that cause flu-like illness 

What distinguishes H1N1 from seasonal flu is its very high rate of spread and its proclivity for causing severe disease in the young especially in young individuals with underlying health conditions 

The story that may have been missed here is that influenza H1N1 included is usually not the immediate cause of death its complications such as viral pneumonia are 

Since effective and safe vaccines are now available for the common pneumonias would it not make better sense to vaccinate against it rather than a constantly changing pool of rhinoviruses? We would continue to get these bugs during the winter but the chances of us ending up in an intensive care unit would be greatly reduced 

So too would our costs of health care

Most Canadians don't seem to differentiate between publicly funded health care and publicly provided health care  Indeed most physicians and clinics in Canada are private enterprises  The issue that perhaps irks those waiting for fair distribution of vaccines is that there are private clinics that offer enhanced services for a fee -- effectively charging for access to a physician  These clinics are now under pressure from their paying clients to provide something they should not provide which is a queue-jumping opportunity for non-priority patients to receive vaccine

I completely agree with you  Now let's go over a few thoughts 

Define fair share  What's fair? Who decides? Am I free to disagree? Am I free to act on my disagreement without violence being initiated against me by you or a third party (government)?

Is sharing supposed to be a coerced act or a voluntary one? Is taxation sharing? Is taxation theft?

Do you think charitable organizations would disappear if government ceased operations? Would you be more or less inclined to donate to a particular charity if you had (a) more money in your pocket and/or (b) government did not have a specific program in place to target the same needs the charity covered? Peter Kavanagh wrote:

Sophie I agree   You should be able to go to your Dr to get the shot   If you live in Ont  you can't go to your Dr's office because the Ministry of health doesn't want to pay $120 a shot at a dr's office
